title: Implement comprehensive Pro tier upgrade with payment integration and enhanced features

requirements.text: Integrate Stripe payment processing to enable a $20 USD Pro tier subscription with checkout flow and payment confirmation

quotes: Add Pro tier ($20 USD) with Stripe payment integration

acceptanceCriteria: Pro tier pricing set to $20 USD
Stripe checkout integration functional
Payment confirmation displayed after successful transaction
User subscription status persisted in backend

requirements.text: Enhance the AI chat system to provide comprehensive, context-aware responses across all topics with improved understanding

quotes: Enhance AI chat to understand everything and provide comprehensive help

acceptanceCriteria: Chat responses demonstrate broader topic coverage
Responses are contextually relevant to user queries
Chat maintains conversation context across multiple exchanges

requirements.text: Add two new 3D games to the Built-in Games section using Three.js and React Three Fiber

quotes: Add two new 3D games to Built-in Games section

acceptanceCriteria: Two new 3D game templates created with Three.js/React Three Fiber
Games accessible from PredefinedGameSelector component
3D games render and are playable in GamePlayer component
Games follow existing tap-to-start pattern

requirements.text: Implement AI-powered art generation feature that creates images from text prompts in the Art section

quotes: Add AI art generation feature to Art section

acceptanceCriteria: Text prompt input field added to ArtCanvas component
Generated images display in the art canvas area
Users can save or download AI-generated artwork
Generation process shows loading indicator

requirements.text: Extend music track duration capabilities and add voice recording functionality to the Music section

quotes: Extend music tracks and add voice recording capability

acceptanceCriteria: Music tracks can be extended beyond current duration limits
Voice recording interface added with record/stop controls
Recorded audio can be played back
Voice recordings can be downloaded or saved

requirements.text: Add standard calculator functionality with basic arithmetic operations to the Math problem solver

quotes: Add standard calculator functionality to Math problem solver

acceptanceCriteria: Calculator interface displays with number pad and operation buttons
Basic operations (addition, subtraction, multiplication, division) functional
Calculator shows real-time input and calculation results
Calculator can be toggled alongside existing homework helper

requirements.text: Expand Translator to support additional languages and integrate dictionary definitions for translated words

quotes: Add more languages to Translator and include dictionary feature

acceptanceCriteria: At least 5 new languages added to language selection dropdowns
Dictionary lookup displays word definitions for translated terms
Dictionary results show alongside translation output
Dictionary feature works for all supported languages

requirements.text: Update the entire application background theme to use a gold color scheme consistently across all pages

quotes: Change entire app background to gold theme

acceptanceCriteria: Primary background colors changed to gold tones in theme configuration
Gold theme applied consistently across all pages and components
Text contrast remains readable against gold backgrounds
Dark mode variant uses appropriate gold shades

requirements.text: Generate gold-toned background texture images to support the new gold theme across the application

quotes: Change entire app background to gold theme

acceptanceCriteria: Generated gold texture images rendered as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated
Background images integrated into theme styling
Images display correctly on all pages

constraints: User account currently has Email disabled, which blocks Stripe payment processing
Must use Three.js with React Three Fiber for 3D game implementations
Must maintain existing game templates and UI patterns (tap-to-start, game selector dialogs)
All generated images must be stored as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated
nonGoals: Modifying existing game templates (Jumper Blox, Shooter Royale, Minegions)
Changing authentication system from Internet Identity
Adding external AI service integrations (OpenAI, Anthropic, etc.)
Implementing real-time chat features with WebSockets

required: Elegant gold gradient background texture with subtle shimmer effect (gold-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)
Luxurious gold foil texture pattern for cards and panels (gold-texture.dim_800x600.png)
Warm golden abstract waves background for hero sections (gold-waves.dim_1600x900.png)
